manzils.text: Qaaf, Nditsuba khukurani yoluyali
Bawukanga mbu Omwikanyilisi yabeetsela okhurula mubo! Abakhayi nibaboola mbu: “ po kano nikokhuchenjia.”
Mbu nikhulifwa mana khube liloba, okhukalukha okho khuli ehale (shikhunyalikhana tawe)
Toto khwamanya shosi shiosi shilemukha khusialo mubio, ne khuli nende eshitabo eshibikhanga koosi
Halali bakhaya obwatoto olwabwabeetsela, mana abo bali mubukoyanu
Shibalolangakhwo likulu hekulu wabu, shingala khwaliumbakha mana nikhulirona, shililikhwo nolwafwa tawe
Ne liloba khwalikwaalasia mana nikhuliramwo	tsingulu,	mana nikhumesiakhwo buli imbia yemimela
Kho shibe eshilolelo nende eshitsulisio khu buli omusumba ulunjikha khuNyasaye
Ne khweshia amaatsi ketsimbabaasi okhurula mwikulu nikhumesilia emikunda nende imele ichesungwa
Nende emitende emirambi chilikhwo ebibuli (chiebulana mubunji)
Omukabo khubandu banje, mana nikhulamusia eshialo shiali nishifwile, ne ni endio nilwa Abandu balilamusibwa
Bakhaya imbeli wabu Abandu ba Nuh nende Abandu ba Rasi nende ba Thamud
Nende ba Aa’d nende ba Firaun nende Abana babu Lut
Nende abamenyi ba Aikat (bomumasokholio) , nende Abandu ba Tubaa, boosi bakhaya Abarumwa mana kabekanyilisibwa nikabanyoola
Ne muparanga	khwachong’a olwakhwabaloonga olwokhuranjilila ? halali bo bali nobukanakani khukhuloongwa okhuyiakha
Netoto khwaloonga Omundu ne khwamanya shimubeyibeyinjia mumwoyo kukwe, nafu khuli ahambi khuye okhushila omusi kwo mwikosi we
Olwa Abamalaika babili balibukanana, owundi niyekhala omukhono omulunji ne owundi omukaata
Shiyakhaboola liosi liosi tawe halali Raqib nende Atid – balihambi naye (bakaandilka)
Ne tsisaalila tsiokhurula omwoyo tsiliitsa khubwatoto. Ako niko kawatechelelanga
Ne ulwika lulikhupwa, eyo niyo inyaanga yeyindukho
Ne buli Omundu aliitsa nali nende Omuliindi nende Omuloli
Aboolelwe mbu: “Toto ewe wali wang’ang’alila kano, mana khukhurere habulafu, kho okhulola khukhwo nyanga yino nokhulayi muno
Ne owashie aliboola mbu: “ wendi ninaye uno amalile okhurechekhwa.”
Musukune mumulilo buli omukhayi omwandakanyu
Owikalilanga amalayi, wabura eshichelo, owuyendinjia (omukanakania)
Ulia watsokaasia Nyasaye nende abanyaye baandi, mana musukune mushinyasio eshilulu
Owashe aliboola “ Nyasaye wanje Omulesi, esie shindamukosia tawe halali ye yali mubukori obwa ehale
Nyasaye aliboola mbu: “ mulasolana imbeli wanje tawe, ndamala okhubarumila amekanyilisio.”
Liumaho likalukhanibwa imbeli wanje tawe, ne esie shekholelanga Abasumba banje obubii tawe
Inyanga yakhulireba Jahanam mbu “ Witsuule ?” nayo ilikalusia mbu : “ Abaandi baliwo umete?”
Ne (Janna) mwikulu ilisitibwa hambi khu baria Nyasaye
Kano niko kalakwa khuyesiyesi ukalukha khu Nyasaye mana niyelinda
Ulia waria Nyasaye khukefisile, mana niyetsa nende omwoyo omulunjifu
Injilimwo nomulembe ino ni inyanga eyilaliwa tawe
Balinyoolamwo shiosishiosi shiabeenya ne khuli nende bishilakhwo
Ne nibenga bakhwasishia imbeli wabu, abali nende amaani okhushila bano! mana nibayiya khushialo muno. koo banyolakhwo abelushila
Toto mu yako khulimwo nende eshitsulisio khu ulia uli nomwoyo nohomba owareka eshirwi naye alolanga
Ne toto khwaloonga likulu nende eshialo nende biosi bilimwo khutsinyanga tsisasaba, ne shikhwanyoola obuchonyi bwosibwosi tawe
Wisumilisie khukababoolanga ne witsomie elira lia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi eliuba nilishili okhurula nende nilishili okhukwa
Ne omwitsomiekhwo khandi eshilo nende niwakhamala okhumwinamila (okhusujuda)
Ne rechelesia inyanga yomulaanji alilanjilia ahambi
Inyangayabaliwulilaoluyokalwomulango kwa toto, eyo niyo inyanga yokhulamusibwa
Toto efwe nefwe balamusinjia nende bafwisinjia, ne ewefu namulikalukha
Inyanga yeshialo shiliatikha lwangu lwangu, okhukhung’asibwa okho khuliba okhwangu khifwe
Efwe khumanyile muno kababoolanga, ne ewe shobarukanga na amani tawe. Ne wikhoonyele Ikuran okhwitsulisia balia abaria inyanga yeyindukho
Nditsuba khu muyeka (imbumbuyeka) kusalaasinjia
Nende kuchinganga emisiiko
Nende kuwutsanga khubwangu
Kukabaanga shinga kulomesibwe
Toto kamulakungwa nikahabwene
Ne toto inyanga yomurungo ilibaho
Nditsuba khulikulu lilinende tsinjila
Toto enywe muli mumakhuwa kawukhaane
Ukalukhanibwa okhurula khubwatoto akalukhanibwa
Abachishi balisishibwa
Balia bakoyanila mubusilu
Barebanga mbu: , ni lina inyanga yomurungo
Inyanga eyo balinyoola eshinyasio shiomulilo
Pile	eshinyasio	shienyu	shino, nishoshamwayungubalilanga
Toto balia baria Nyasaye baliba mwikulu mumikunda nende tsisebele
Nebalinyoola ka Nyasaye abahele, toto abo bali bamalayi
Bakonanga hatiti eshilo
Ne ishilo nibutsia okhushia balamanga nibasaba eshileshelo
Ne mumiandu chiabu omukabo kwa basabi nende balasabanga kwalimwo
Ne khushialo khulikhwo nende ebimanyisilio khubasuubila toto
Ne khu mibili chienyu, “koo shimulolangakhwo tawe?”
Ne mwikulu kuliyo omukabo kwenyu, nende kamulakungwa
Kho nditsuba khu Nyasaye Omulesi welikulu nende eshialo, mbu toto kano nikahabwene shinga enywe muboolanga
Koo lwakhuulilakhwo olukano lwa bacheni ba Ibrahim boluyali
Olwa benjila ewuwe niboola mbu: “ Mulembe” Naye nabakalusia mbu: “Mulembe muno Abandu bengorerwe”
Natsia khubandu be, niyetsa nende eshimosi shianera
Nabasitilia hambi eshiakhulia, nabareba mbu: “shimulia tawe ?”
Naba noburi khubo, nibamuboolela mbu “olaria tawe ” ne nibamulaka Omusiani Omuchesi
Nilwa Omukhasi wuwe yabachoma, nawuka niyepama obweni naboola mbu: “ Esie omushiele mana omukumba ndakhebula endie? ”
nibaboola mbu: “ endio nilwakali nilwa Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi oboolele, toto niye Owamachesi muno Omumanyi po
Naboola mbu: “ Murumilwe shina enywe Abarumwa ? ”
Nibabola mbu: “ toto efwe khurumilwe khubandu abetsimbi.”
Khubalasile amachino keliloba
Karebwakhwo eshimanyisio okhurula khu Nyasaye wo khulwa balia babura eshichelo
Ne nikhurusiamwo Abasuubili balimwo
Ne shikhwanyoolamwo halali inzu ndala yonyene yabasuubili
Ne nikhulekhamwo eshimanyisio khubalia baritsanga eshinyasio eshilulu
Ne khulukano lwa Musa, olwa khwamuruma khu Firauni nende ebifune bilolekha
Nakhola obufuru khumaanikeke naboola mbu, “ Oli Omulosi nohomba Omulalu”
Nenikhumutila nende omukanda kukwe kwabalwani nikhubasukuna munyanza naye nali ufunaanibwa
Ne (ukhusishibwa khwa) Abandu ba A’aad, olwa khwabarumila omuyeka omukumba
Shikwalekha shiosi shosi shiakwaburakhwo halali nikushikhola shinga likoshe
Ne Abandu ba Thsamudi, Olwa baboolelwa mbu: “ Musangale / mwikhoye khubise bititi”
Ne nibakhaya okhulonda amalako ka Nyasaye wabu, mana likulu nilibakhupa nabo nibalola
Mana nibakhaywa okhwema ne nibalanyalilwa akhwihabina tawe
Ne Abandu ba Nuh imbeli eyo, toto bali Abandu aboononi
Ne likulu khwaliumbakha khumaani nende obunyali, ne toto efwe khuli nobunyali obushila ako
Ne liloba khwaliala, ne khuli abaali abalayi balibarie efwe
Ne buli eshindu khwaloonga eshisaatsa neshikhasi kho munyoole okhwitsulila
Mwilushile ewa Nyasaye, toto esie endi omwikanyilisi wenyu owahabulafu
Ne mulameta khu Nyasaye, nyasaye wundi tawe, toto esie endi omwikanyilisi wahabulafu urula khuye
Ne endio,shiyabetsela Omurumwa yesi yesi khubali imbeli wabu halali baboola mbu: “Oyo ni Omulosi nohomba Omulalu”
Ne koo baboolanila kano? halali bo ni Abandu abakhayi
Mana lekhana ninabo, nawe sholafunanibwa tawe
Ne itsulisia, toto ametsulisio kakhoonyanga Abasuubili
Ne shindaloonga Majini nende Abandu halali khulwokhunaama esie
Ne Shebenyakhwo omukabo tawe, ne shindenya bandisie tawe
Toto Nyasaye niye Omukabi, Owamani amanji
Ne toto balia abamabii, bali nende tsimbi tsiabu shinga tsimbi tsia abaashiabwe. kho balayungubasia tawe
Ne eshinyasio eshikhongo khubalia bakhaya inyanga yabu yabalakwa
Nditsuba khulukulu lwa Tur
Nende khushitabu shiahandikwa
Khuliseelo liabambulwa
Nende khunzu yombakhwa
Nende khushitsafu shiachingulwa
Nende khunyanza yetsula
Toto eshinyasio shia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi shilibaho
Abulaho ulishikalila
Inyanga yelikulu lilirenga okhurenga khwene
Ne tsingulu lwatsilikulukha bukulukha
Eshinyasio eshikhongo inyanga eyo shiliba khubayingani
Balia babayanga mumakhuwa kobusilu
Inyanga yabaliluumwa mumulilo obutinyu
Baliboolewa mbu: “Kuno niko omulilo kwa mwaingananga.”
Koo buno ni obulosi nohomba shimulolangasa tawe
Injilemwo, mwifwile nohomba mukhaye okhwifwila ninashilala, toto enywe murungungwa kamwakholanga
Toto balia baria Nyasaye baliba mwikulu mumikunda nende mubwokholo
Nibasangalila khuka Nyasaye wabu abahele, ne Nyasaye wabu alibahonokosia khu shinyasio shiomulilo
Lie ne munywe mumwikhoyo khukalia kamwakholanga
Ne baliyekha khubifumbi bwoluyali, bilondokhane khulunyaali, ne khulibabashila Abakhana bomwikulu (Hurul ain)
Ne balia basuubila mana olwibulo lwabu nilubaloonda khukhusuubila khulibabukanania, ne shikhulibalemilia khubikhole biabu shiosishiosi tawe, buli Omundu alirungwa shiayakhola
Ne khulibametela buli imbia yebiamo nende yeyinyama shingala benya
Balihelesaniamwo tsigilasi tsilimwo eshinywebwa shibulamwo eshifwabi nohomba obwonooni
Ne Abakholi babu balibabotokhana, bang’enang’ena opara mbu ebisole bifunikhwe mugilasi
Ne balihengana nibareebana
Baliboola mbu: “Toto efwe khwali khale nabandu befu nikhwaria.”
Mana Nyasaye nakhukhonya, nakhuhonia okhurulana nende eshinyasio shiomulilo
Toto efwe khwamulanganga Ye yenyene butswa. Toto ye niye omulayi wobukoosia
Kho yitsulisia, ne khutsimbaasi tsia Nyasaye wo sholi Omulosi nohomba Omulalu tawe
Nohomba boboolanga mbu uno ni omukaasia wetsinyimbo, wakhulindanga lifwa limuulile
Boola mbu: “Lindilisie toto esie siesi endi halala ninanyu mukhulindilisia.”
Nohomba amaparo kabu niko kabarumanga kario, nohomba bo ni Abandu abafuru butswa
Nohomba baboolanga mbu: “wakasia kano!” halali bo shibasuubilangasa tawe
Mana barere amakhuwa shinga kano, nikali mbu baboolanga akatoto
Nohomba shibaalongwa okhurula khu shiosi shiosi tawe, nohomba bo nibo baloonga
Nohomba nibo baloonga likulu nende eshialo? Halali babula obulaamba
Nohomba bali nende libishilo lia Nyasaye wuwo, nohomba nibo bali nobunyali
Nohomba bali netsingasi tsiokhurechelesiakhwo? mana omurechelesi wabu oyo arere ebifune bilolekha
Nohomba Nyasaye ali nabakhana nanyu muli nabasiani
Nohomba abarebanga bakhurunge nabo bali nende obuleemu bwo murungo oko
Nohomba bamanyile akefisa mana bakahandika
Nohomba benyanga okhukholela amatemo? Halali balia bakhaya nibo abalenjila mumatemo
Nohomba bali nende Nyasaye wundi owulali Nyasaye? Nyasaye nomutswenufu khubia bamutsokasinjia ninaye
Ne nibalolanga lileesi lieshinyasio nilikwa okhurula hekulu, bakhaboolele mbu ni amalesi kachingane
Ne baleshe okhuula lwabalibukaanana nende inyanga yabu yabalisishibwa
Inyanga yamarechekho kabu shikakhabakhoonye shiosi shiosi tawe, ne shibalihabinwa tawe
Ne toto balia abakhola amabii, balinyoola eshinyasio shindi shilali shino tawe, ne abaanji mubo shibamanyile tawe
Ne linda okhubusia khwa Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi, toto ewe oli mutsimoni tsiefu, ne mutswenule khulwokhumwitsomia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi olwa oba niwema
Ne eshilo khandi omwitsoomie nende olwe tsing’ining’ini tsitsia
Nditsuba	khu	ing’iningini	olwa ikhamiukhanga
Owashienywe	uno shiyakora tawe nohomba shiyetsukhanila tawe
Ne shaboolanga khubwikombi bubwe tawe
Halali ni obufimbuli bwafimbulilungwa
Yechesibwa nende Owamani amanji
Owakukhanga niyewotselesia
Naye ali hekulu muno
Mana owitsanga ahambi niyekha
Naba hambi shinga akari wemikhono chibili nohambo ahambi muno
Mana namufimbulila Omusumba we ubufimbuli
Omwoyo	shikwaboola	obubeyi khukakwalolo tawe
Koo mumuyingasinjia khukayalola
Mana toto namulola khandi
Mushisina shio musaala ( mkunazi) kwo khu malilikha
Ahambi nende omusaala oko, kuliwo omukunda kwamenywamwo
Olwa kwafimbwa omusaala oko nende shiakufiimba
Tsimoni shitsiesundukha tawe nohomba shitsiabura eshichelo tawe
Toto yalola ebimanyisio ebikhongo bia Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi
Koo mwalolakhwo Laata nende Uzza
Nende Manata, owundi wakhataru
Koo nenywe muli nabasiani Naye alinabakhaana
Toto okho ni okhukaba okhubi

Ako namerasa kamwakulikha enywe nende basenywe, Nyasaye shiyeshiakhwo shiosi shiosi khumeera ako tawe. balondangasa amaparo nende shie mioyo chiabu chienya, ne toto abulunjifu bwabetsela okhurula khu Nyasaye wabu
Mbu Omundu anyoolanga shia yekombanga
Nyasaye sa niye mwene eshialo nende mwikulu
Ne ni Abamalaika benga bali mwikulu, abokhusabila khwabu shikhulikhoonya yesi yesi tawe, halali khuwa Nyasaye achamile namufuchilila
Toto biala balasuubilanga mwikulu tawe balanganga Abamalaika amera keshikhasi
Ne babula shiabamanyile khu ako, balondanga butswa amaparo, ne toto okhuparirisia shikhukhoonyanga shiosi shiosi khubwatoto tawe
Lekhana nende ulia uhelesia omukongo ametsulisio kefu, ne shiyenya shosi shosi halali obulamu bwokhushialo
Awo naboolela khubumanyi, toto Nyasaye wuwo niye umanyile muno ulia wakora khunjila ye, naye amanyile muno ulia walunjikha
Ne nibia Nyasaye biosi bili mwikulu nende mushialo, kho abarunge betsimbi khukabakholanga ne abakhola amalayi abarunge obulayi

Balia beikalilanga okhukhola ebionono ebikhongo nende akeshifwabi, halali orwonono orutiti titi, Toto Nyasaye wuwo obulesheli bwe nobuunji, Ye abamanyile muno, olwa yabaloonga okhurula khuliloba , nende ngamwali mutsinda tsia banyinenywe, kho muleelole tawe, Ye amanyile muno owamuria
Koo! Walolakhwo ulia ufutariranga
Nayinia shitutu mana niyemana
koo akhali nende obumanyi khu kefisile, mana alolanga
Nohomba shiyabolelwakhwo khukali mubitabu bia Musa
Nende Ibrahim wosia indache
Mbu Omundu shalichinga tsimbi tsiowashie tawe
Ne Omundu shalinyoola halali kalia kayakhola
Ne toto ebikhole bibie bililolekha
Mana alirungwa omurungo kukwe kwosi
Ne toto khu Nyasaye wuwo niwo akaliweela
Ne toto niye ureranga okhutsekha nende okhulila
Naye toto niye owufwisinjia nende ulamusinjia
Ne toto ye niye waloonga eshisatsa nende eshikhasi
Okhurulana nende imwo yolwibulo nimitswa
Netoto mbu kali khuye okhulamusibwa khandi
Naye	niye	uyindiasinjia	nende uhelasinjia
Naye	niye	Nyasaye	Omuleli wetsing’ining’ini tsia (shiira)
Naye niye wasishia A’ad beimbeli
Nende Tsamudi shibalekhwa tawe
Nende Abandu ba Nuhu abaliho imbeli, Toto bali ababii muno ebitsimbi po
Nende tsingongo tsiakalukhanibwa, niye watsikalukhania
Nitsifuunikhwa nende biatsifuunikha
Mana nitsimbabaasi shina tsia Nyasaye wuwo tsiokanakananga
Uno ni omwikanyilisi, mubekanyilisi beyimbeli
Inyanga yeyindukho ilihambi
Owumao wakhaibuula owulali Nyasaye
Ne	amakhuwa	kano nikamwisundushilanga
Ne mutsekhanga ne shimulilanga tawe
Nanyu muli mubukoyani
Ne musujudile Nyasaye ne mumulaame
Indukho ilihambi, ne omwesi kwabuukhemwo
Ne nibalola eshimanyisio shiosi shiosi bashifutarira nibaboola mbu “ buno nobulosi butsilililanga”
Ne baingasia ne nibaloonda okhwenya khwabu, ne buli likhuwa liemekhwa
Netoto kamala okhuboolela amakhuwa kalimwo obwalaba
Amachesi kafung’anile, halali amekanyilisio shikakhoonya eshindu khubo tawe
Mana lekhana ninabo. Inyanga yalilaanga omulaanji okhutsiila likhuwa lio mwoyo kwakhaya
Tsimoni tsiabwe tsilihenga hasi, Balirula mubilindwa opara mbu nitsisiche tsisaalanibwe
Nibelushila Omulaanji, ne Abakhayi baliboola mbu: “Inyanga ino ni indinyu.”
Abandu ba Nuh bakhaya bo nibashili, nibayingasia	Omusumba	wefu, nibamuboolela mbu nomulalu mana nibamwalabila.(nibamululila)
Mana nasaba Nyasaye wuwe; naboola mbu: Toto esie ekhailwe, kho habine
Mana nikhwikula emiliango chomwikulu khu maatsi kayombokhanga
Ne nikhufutula liloba nikhukhola emialo (emichela), amatsi nikabukanana khulikhuwa liali niliburire
Ne nikhubachinga khushietsimbao nende imikoye. (Isafina)
Yatsitsanga nikhuyihenga, okhuba ni omurungo khu kalia kabamuingasinjia
Ne toto bwene khwachikhola okhuba eshimanyisio, ne koo khuliwo nende witsulila
kho eshinyasio shianje shiali shirie, nende okhwikannyilisia khwanje
Ne toto efwe khwakhola Ikurani ibe inyangu okhumanya, ne koo khuliwo nende witsulila
Babu A’di bakhaya, kho eshinyasio shianje shiali shirie nende okhwikanyilisia khwanje
Toto efwekhwabarumila omuyeka kweyimbumbuyeka khutsinyanga tsimbi tsilondokhaane
Nikusiula Abandu opara mbu nebisichiri biemisala chisiulilwe
Mana eshinyasio shianje shiali shirie nende amekanyilisio kanje
Netoto efwe khwakhola Ikurani ibe inyangu okhuyimanya, Ne koo khuliwo nende witsulila
Abandu ba Thamudi bayingasia Abekanyilisi
Nibaboola mbu : “Khuloonde Omundu namundu urula mwifwe, efwe mana khuba khulaba mubokori bwahabulalu.”
Niye butswa yenyene okhurula mwifwe wamakanyiliso keshela ? halali uno nomubeyi omukhongo omufuru
Nibamanye mutsuli niwina umubeeyi omukhongo omufuru
Toto efwe khwitsa okhubarumila ingamia ikhasi kulwa okhubatema, mana obahenge butswa mana wifwile
Ne baboolele mbu amatsi kalakabulwamwo hakari wabu, balakabukhasibwa khulwa okhukanywa
Mana nibalaanga Omundu wabu, niyetsa nayisinza
Ne eshinyasio shianje shiali shirie nende okhwikanyilisia khwanje
Toto efwe khwabarumila oluyoka lulala lwonyene, nibabashinga abitiisi biokhumbashila olukaka
Ne toto efwe khwakhola Ikurani okhuba Inyangu, ne koo khuliwo nende witsulila
Abandu ba Lut bayingasia abekanyilisi
Toto efwe khwabarumila eshifulumutu shiamachina halali abaloondi ba Lut, khwabahabina mumabwibwi
Tsimbabasi okhurulu khwifwe, Endio nilwakhurunganga ulia ukhupanga orio muno
Ne toto yabekanyilisilia eshinyasio shiefu, halali bo bali netsinganakani khumekanyilisio ako
Ne toto benya mbu abahelesie abacheni be, mana nikhubawofusia tsimoni tsiabu , nikhubaboolela mbu: “pile eshinyasio shianje namekanyilisio.”
Ne toto shiabeeshela eshinyasio shitsilila mumabwibi
Kho mana pile eshinyasio shianje namekanyilisio
Netoto khwakhola Ikurani okhuba inyangu, ne koo khiliwo nende witsulila
Netoto Abekanyilisi betsela Abandu ba Firaun
Bakhaya ebimanyisio biefu biosi pe, mana nikhubatila omutilo kwa amaani kwobunyali
Ne Abakhayi benyu bali nende amani okhushila abo baranjilila nohomba kahandikwa mubitabu mbu enywe mubule okhufunaanibwa
Nohomba baboolanga mbu: ‘‘efwe khuli abaanji khulishila butswa.’’
Abanji abo balashilwa ne balakalukha inyuma tsimbilo
Halali inyanga yeyindukho niyabalakwa, Ne indukho ni isiro muno mana khandi indulu pa
Toto Abetsimbi balimubukori nende mubulalu
Inyanga yabaliswerululwa mafumama nibasukunwa mumulilo, baliboolelwa mbu : ‘‘pile omulilo kwa Jahanam.’’
Ne toto buli eshindu khwaloonga khushichelo
Ne likhuwa liefu nililala butwa, shinga okhulimba no khulimbula tsimoni
Ne toto khwasishia abashienywe alikho mwinywe uparanga
Ne koosi kabakhola kali mubitabu
Liosi liosi lititi nende likhonga liahandikwa
Toto balia baria Nyasaye baliba mwikulu mumikunda chilimwo emialo
Mushikhalo shiatoto, ewo Omwami Omunyali
Owetsimbabaasi tsinyinji
Yechesia Ikurani
Yaloonga Omundu
Namwechesia okhuboola
Eliuba nende omwesi bichendanga khubise
Ne emilandula nende emisaala binamilanga Nyasaye

Niye woloonga likulu nende eshialo, khutsinyanga sita, Mana naleeng’ana khu shisaala, yamanya shinjilanga mwiloba nende shirulangamwo, nende shikholomokhanga okhurula mwikulu nende bininanga hekulu, Naye alininanyu wosiwosi wamuli. Ne Nyasaye alolanga muno kamukholanga

Ne muli murie mula suubilanga khu Nyasaye ne Omurumwa abalaanganga, mbu musuubile khu Nyasaye wenyu, naye toto yamala okhubukula indache yenyu, toto nimuli abasuubili
Ye niye wishilinjia omusumba wuwe tsinyaali tsinoosinjia, kho tsibarusie mushiilima nitsibeenjisia mubulafu, Ne toto Nyasaye khwinywe ni Omwihotselefu Owobukoosia muno

Muli murie mularusinjia khunjila ya Nyasaye, ne nibiaNyasaye biosi bili khushialo nende mwikulu, shibali nashilala tawe owayiinia mwinywe nikhushili okhufungula Makka, mana nalwaana, abo bali nende omurungo omukhongo okhushila balia bayinia Makka niyikulwe, mana nibalwana, ne boosi Nyasaye yabalaka amalayi, ne Nyasaye amanyile koosi pe kamukholanga
Ni wina wiwosia Nyasaye likofi lilayi, ne amurunge omurungo kumeteshe, ne anyoole omurungo kwobuhaani

Inyanga yolilola abasuubili abasatsa nabakhasi, obulafu bwabu buli imbeli wabu, nende omukhono kwabu omusaatsa, omwikhoyo kwenyu lelo, emikunda chiburangamwo emialo , mulikhalamwo tsinyanga tsiosi, okho nikho okhubura okhukhongo

Inyanga ya abishikhabili abeshisatsa nende abeshikhasi baliboolela abasuubili mbu: ‘‘mukhuliinde khunyoole okhulolela obulafu bwenyu.’’ lisisi lilirebwa hakari wabu lio muliango – mkari nikwetsimbabaasi na elwanyi nikweshinyasio

Balibalaanga nibababoolela mbu: “Abayiee shikhwali ninanyu?” balibaboolela mbu: “Nabweene, halali enywe mwechemela abeene	nimukanakana,	nimuba neshibeyibeyi ne obwikombi bwe mioyo chienyu nibumukosia, okhula shingala Nyasaye wuwo abusiiye, mana omubeyi nababeya okhukhaya okhuloonda Nyasaye
Toto nyanga ino sishilibukulwa shiosi shiosi khwinywe shokhubanunula tawe, nohomba balia abakhaya, eshimenyo shienyu ni mumulilo, nimwamukhoyeshele, ne amakalushilo amabii kamakana

Ne koo ebise bishili okhula khubasuubila emioyo chiabu chihotselesie khulwokhwitsulila Nyasaye nende khulwa amakhuwa ka toto keshibwe? Ne balaba shinga balia abahebwa eshitabu bali imbile wabu, nibaba nende ebise ebirambi, imioyo chiabu nichiba emiumilano, ne obunji bwabu nibaba abetsimbi
Manye mbu Nyasaye alamusinjia liloba nilimalile okhufwa, toto khubenoosiye ibimanyisio biefu khomunyoole okhupara
Toto balia abobwatoto abasatsa nabakhasi, bewosinjia Nyasaye likofi lilayi, balimetelwakhwo muno, ne balinyoola Omurungo kwabuwani bwabu

Ne balia basuubila Nyasaye nende Abarumwa bebe abo nibo abobwatoto, nende abaloli imbeli wa Nyasaye wabu Omulesi, abo balinyoola omurongo kwabu nende obulafu bwabu, ne balia bakhaya, nibaingasia ebimanyisio biefu, abo nibo Abandu bomumulilo

Manye mbu obulamu bwokhushialo nomubayo nende okhukalilisia, nende okhwirona nende okhwilaya mwinywe nende okhushilana khumiandu nende Abana, bili shinga ifula, yemimela chiabu chisangasia abalimi, mana chitse chiume chikalukhane namabuyu mana chibe amasakaria, ne mwikulu khuli neshinyasio nende obulesheli nende okhufuchililwa okhurula khu Nyasaye, ne obulamu bwokhushialo shinishiosi shiosi tawe halali omwikhoyo kwobubeyi

Ilushile eshileshelo shia Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi, nende omukunda kwomwikulu uburakalafu bwakwo bulishinga oburakalafu bwo mwikulu nende eshialo, kwarecheshelwa Abasuubila Nyasaye nende Abarumwa bebe, etso nitso tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye yelesinjia owayenya, ne Nyasaye ali netsimbaasi tsinyinji
Ne amasila kosikosi shimwakhanyoola khushialo nohomba mwinywe halali khwamala okhubandichila mushitabu ,nikhushiili okhubaloonga, toto ako khu Nyasaye ni amangu
Khomukhaye okhubeelela khushikorere mwinywe, ne mukhaye okhwilola khushiabahelesiye ne Nyasaye shiyachama ulia wibulisinjia ni yelola tawe
Balia bemananga ne balomesinjia Abandu okhuba abeemani, ne ulia ukhaya amanye mbu Nyasaye niye Omuyinda Owitsomibwa muno

Ne toto khwaruma Abarumwa befu nende bimanyisio binoosia, ne nikhubeshilia eshitabu nende eshichelo, kho Abandu beme khubwatoto, ne nikhwishia eshichuma shia amani amanji nende obukhoonyi khubandu, kho Nyasaye amanye ni wina umuhabina nende Abarumwa bebe khumakhuwa kefisile, toto Nyasaye niwa Amani Omushili muno
Ne toto khwaruma Nuhu nende Ibrahim mana nikhura mulwibulo lwabu oburumwa nende eshitabu, mana khuli nende abasuubila mubo, ne abaanji mubo ni abakori

Mana nikhubalondiakhwo Abarumwa abaanji inyuma wabu, ne nikhulondiakho Yesu Omwana wa Mariam, ne nikhumuwa injili, ne nikhura mumioyo chiabaloondi be eshisanendetsimbabaasi, nende“ obusirasoti” abeene nibo bachachia, sikhwa balachila ako tawe, halali okhukonya tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye, halali shibaalondanga kenyekhana tawe. Mana balia basuubila mubo khwabawa omurungo kwabu, ne abanji mubo nabonooni

Enywe abasuubila rie Nyasaye ne musuubile Omurumwa wuwe, yetsa akhubahelesia emikabo chibili mutsimbaasi tsie, ne alabahelesia obulafu bwokhuchendela, ne alabaleshela naye Nyasaye ni Omunji Owetsimbabaasi
Kho Abandu beshitabu bamanye mbu babula obunyali khutsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye, ne tsimbabaasi tsiosi tsili mumukhono kwa Nyasaye ahelesinjia owayenya, Ne Nyasaye niwetsimbasi tsinyinji

Toto Nyasaye awulile amakhuwa komukhasi	urebananga	ninawe okhulondokhana nende Omusatsa wuwe, ne alilila Nyasaye wuwe, ne Nyasaye awulilanga amakalusanio kenyu, toto Nyasaye ni Omuwulili muno, Omuloli po
Balia basilanga Abakhasi babu mwinywe, abo shinibanyinabwe tawe, banyinabwe nibalia ababeebula, ne toto abo baboolanga likhuwa libii nende liobubeyi, ne toto Nyasaye niwokhubeela Omulesheli muno

Ne balia basilanga abakhasi babu mana nibakalukha inyuma khukababoolele, bakhoyele banunule Omurumwa nibashili okhuba halala, endio nilwamwikanyilisibwa khu (makhuwa) ako, ne Nyasaye ni Omumanyi muno khukoosi kamukholanga

Ne ulanyoola omurumwa wokhununula tawe, afunge emiesi chibili chilondana nibashili okhuba halala. Ne ulanyalilwa ako tawe alisie abamanani amakhumi kasaasaba. Endio kho musuubile khu Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, ne etso nitso tsinzakho tsia Nyasaye, ne Abakhayi balinyoola eshinyasio eshilulu

Ne toto balia bayingasinjia Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, balinyoola eshifimbwa murwe shinga balia baranjilila, netoto khwamala ukhubeeshilia ebimanyisio bilolekha, ne abakhayi bakhanyoole eshinyasio sheshifimbwa murwe
Inyanga ya Nyasaye yakhabalamusie boosi pe mana ababoolele koosi kabakhola, Nyasaye yakabikha nabo bakebilila, ne Nyasaye nomuloli wabuli eshindu

Shololangakhwo mbu Nyasaye yamanya biosi bili mwikulu nendu mushialo, shikhwakhaba okhwimoonya khwa Abandu bataru tawe halali Nyasaye niwokhune khubo, nohomba khwabane halali ye (Nyasaye) ni wakharano khubo, nohomba babe batiti khubo nohomba abanji khu abo halali ali ninabo, wosiwosi abali, mana alibaboolela kabakholanga inyanga yeyindukho, toto Nyasaye nomumanyi muno wabuli eshindu

Shololangakhwo balia bakanibwa okhumoonyana, mana nibakalushila kabakanibwa,	ne	bamoonyana khumakhuwa kobwonooni nende obusuku, nende akokhumukhaya Omurumwa. Ne nibakhwitsila shibakhushesinjia shingala Nyasaye wuwo akhushesinjia tawe, ne baboolanga mumioyo chiabu mbu: “sichila shina, Nyasaye nalakhwelesia eshinyasio khukakhuboolanga kano?” Mana omulilo kwa jahanam kulibayela, balinjilamwo! Ne ako ni amakalushilo amabii kali karie
Enywe abasuubila, nimumoonyana mlamoonyana	khutsimbi	nende obusuku nende okhuloba Omurumwa tawe, mumoonyane khumalayi nende okhuria Nyasaye, ne murie Nyasaye owamulikhung’asibwa imbeli wuwe
Toto obumoonyi burula khu Shetani, kho asinyisie Abasuubili, ne shibulaho shiosi shosi – shinyala shiabawumisia halali khubunyali bwa Nyasaye. Ne Nyasaye butswa niwabasuubili besiche

Enywe Abasuubili, nimuboolelwa musitanile mubwikhalo, sitilanile, Nyasaye alabahelesia obwiyangu ne nimuboolelwa mbu rule, murule Nyasaye achingulanga balia basuubila mwinywe nende balia basoma mubichelo biawukhane ne Nyasaye amanyile muno kamukholanga

Enywe Abasuubili nimumoonyela Omurumwa muranjilisie eshihanwa nimushili okhumumoonyela, endio nibo obulayi khwinywe nende obutswenufu muno. Ne nimulanyoola shokhurusia tawe , toto bwene Nyasaye ni Omulesheli, Owetsimbabaasi

Muritsanga okhuyinia ebihanwa nimushili okhusungana? Nenimulakhola murio tawe kho Nyasaye afuchilile okhwikanila khwenyu, mana mulumilile okhulaama , ne muyinie izakaa (eshihanwa) ne murie Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe ne Nyasaye ni Omumanyi muno khukamukholanga
Sholola balia bakhola obwitsa nende Abandu ba Nyasaye yasinyishila, shibali mwinywe noho enywe shimuli mubo tawe, ne betsubanga khububeyi nibamanyile
Nyasaye yabarecheshela eshinyasio eshilulu toto kabakholanga ni amabii muno
Bakhola ebitsubo biabu okhuba ingabo, mana nibekalila injila ya Nyasaye , khubo bali neshinyasio shiokhututuyibwa
Emiandu nende Abana babu shibilibakhoonya shiosi shiosi imbeli wa Nyasaye tawe, abo nabandu bomumulilo balimenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi
Inyanga ya Nyasaye alibalamusia boosi ne balimwitsubila shinga bamwitsubilanga enywe, ne baparanga mbu bali abwene , koo, toto abo nibo ababeyi
Shetani yabeekhalamwo mana nabeebilisia emetsulisio ka Nyasaye. oko niko omukanda kwa Shetani, koo toto omukanda kwa shetani niko kwasikha
Toto balia bekalilanga amakhuwa ka Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, abo baliba neshifimbwa murwe shimalayo
Nyasaye yabusia mbu “Toto nisie ulishila nende omurumwa wanje” Toto Nyasaye Niwamani Omushili

Shiwakhanyoola Abandu basuubila Nyasaye nende inyanga imalilishi, nibayanzanga balia abaloba Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe tawe, kata nibakhaba basaabwe, nohomba Abana baabu, nohomba Abasiani babu nohomba Abakhasi babu. Abo Nyasaye yara mumioyo chiabu obusuubili, ne nabahelesia amani ka roho akhurula khuye. Ne alibenjisia mwikulu mumikunda chiburangamwo emialo, balimenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi, Nyasaye yabafuchilila nabo nibamufuchilila, Abo nibo bomukanda kwa Nyasaye. koo toto bwene omukanda kwa Nyasaye niko kulishila
Bitsoominjia Nyasaye biosi bili Mwikulu nende bili Mushialo, Naye Niwamani Owamachesi muno

Niye warusia Abakhayi okhurula mu balia bahebwa eshitabu Mutsinzu tsiabu, ebise biokhuwuya khwa ambeli, shimwaparakhwo mbu banyala okhurula tawe, nibapara mbu tsingoba tsiabu tsilabaliinda khu Nyasaye, halali Nyasaye yaboolela munjila yabalamanyile tawe, nara amayendo mumioyo chiabu, basambulanga tsinzu tsiabu nemikhono chiabu, nende emikhono chiabasuubili, khoparemwo enywe abetsimoni
Ne naba mbu Nyasaye shiyabahandichila okhurula tawe yakhabahelesiye eshinyasio khusialo ne inyanga imalilishi bakhabe nende eshinyasio shio mumulilo
Ako nilwokhubeela mbu booma omirwe khu makhuwa ka Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, ne ulia wumila Nyasaye omurwe , toto Nyasaye niweshinyasio eshilulu
Omusala kwosikwosi kwamuremele, nohomba kwamuleshele nikwemele khushisina shiakwo, nikhubunyali bwa Nyasaye ne abonooni bafimbwe omurwe

Ne omwandu kwa Nyasaye yahelesia omurumwa wuwe okhurula khubo, shimwakulwanila okhwikhonyela tsifarasi nohomba tsingamia tawe, halali Nyasaye ahelesinjia Abarumwa bebe obunyali khu yesi yesi wayenya ne Nyasaye nomunyali wabuli eshindu

Ne omwandu kwa Nyasaye yahelesia Omurumwa wuwe okhurula khubandu betsingongo, nikwa Nyasaye nende Omurumwa, nende Abeekho, nende Abafwilwa, nende Abamanani nende bananjila, kho kukhaye okhubotokhana khubayinda mwinywe, ne shia Omurumwa abahelesia mubukule ne shiabakaya mushileshe, ne murie Nyasaye , toto Nyasaye niweshinyasio eshilulu
Nikwa Abamanani abawuyi abaloondwa mutsinzu tsiabu nibanulwa omwandu kwabu, bakhabanga amalayi, okhurula khu Nyasaye wabu, nende obuchami, ne bahabinanga Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, abo nibo abatoto

Ne balia bali namatala nende obusuubili imbeli wabu, bayanza balia babawuyilamwo ne shibali nobwimani mumioyo chiabu tawe khushabahelesibwa ne beyimanga kata nibali mbu bo nibakhoyeshele, ne ulia wikalila obwimani bwo mwoyo kukwe, abo nibo ababura

Nebalia betsa inyuma wabu baboolanga mbu Nyasaye khuleshele efwe nende Abana befu abakhuranjilila mubusuubili, ne olara mumioyo chiefu ishinda khubalia basuubila tawe, Nyasaye wefu toto oli Omwihotselefu Owetsimbabaasi muno

Shololangakhwo balia abefisa mubasuubila baboolelanga abashiabwe abakhayi mubandu bahebwa eshitabu mbu: “Nimurusibwa khularula halala ninanyu, ne shikhularia mwinywe yesiyesi tawe, ne nimukhuywa khulabahabina.” Ne Nyasaye ali nende obwatoto mbu bakatinjia
Nibarusibwa, shibalarula halala ninabo tawe ne nibakhuywa shibalabahabina tawe, nenibaba bahabina balabelukha mana shibalabahabina tawe
Toto enywe muli eshirisio eshikhongo mumioyo chiabu okhushila Nyasaye, ako ni khulwa okhuba mbu bo ni Abandu balamanyile shiosi shiosi tawe

Shibalakhuyananga ninanyu mwesi tawe, halali mutsingongo tsietsingoba nohomba inyuma wamasiisi, emielo chiabu abeene khubeene ni emisiro, ne opara mbu balihalala ne emioyo chiabu chikabukhaane, ako ni khulwokhuba mbu abo na Abandu balekhonyelanga amachesi tawe
Bali shinga balia bali imbeli wabu hatiti, Batemwa amakhuwa kabu nikabiya, mana balinyoola eshinyasio eshilulu
Shinga shetani olwayaboolela Omundu mbu khaya, olwa yakhaya yaboola mbu : “esie endi ehalee ninawe esie ndaria Nyasaye Omulesi webilonje biosi.”
Ne niiba indukho yabu mbu totobo balimumulilo tsinyanga tsiosi , ne oko niko omurungo kwa Abonooni
Enywe balia basuubila, rie Nyasaye Ne buli shia mundu ahenge nishina shiayekasiliyie mutsuli, ne murie Nyasaye, Toto Nyasaye nomumanyi po khukamukholanga
Ne mulaba shinga balia bebilila Nyasaye mana nabakhola nibeyibilila, Abo nibo abashiamu
Shibayelana tawe Abandu bomulilo nende Abandu bo mwikulu, Abandu bomwikulu nibo abalibura
Khwishinjia Ikurani ino khulukulu wakhalulutsi niluriire nilwatikhana khulwokhuria Nyasaye, ne endio nilwakhuchelasilinjia Abandu bakhaba bario banyoola okhupara
Ye niye Nyasaye, Neabulaho Nyasayewundi tawe halali ye, Omumanyi wakefisa nende kalolekha, naye ni Omunji wetsimbabaasi Omukoosia muno
Naye Niye Nyasaye abulaho owundi halali ye, Omwaami, Woluyali , Womulembe, Omureri Womulembe, uyilanga amakhuke Omwene, Owaamani , ukholonga liayenya, omukhongo, Ni Omutswenufu khubamumuretsanga khwo
Naye niye Nyasaye Omuloonji, Omukaasi, uretsangakhwo obukoondo, ali nende ameera amalayi, bimwitsominjia biosi bili Mwikulu nende mushialo naye niye Omushili, Owamachesi muno

Enywe Abasuubila mulakhola Abasuku banje nende Abasuku benyu okhuba abeetsa , bamwachama tawe, netoto bamala okhukhaya abwatoto bwamwitsila, bekalilanga Omurumwa nende enywe okhusuubila khu Nyasaye Omulesi wenyu, Olwamurulanga khulwa okhulwaana khunjila yanje, nende okhukhaaba tsimbabaasi tsianje, mukholanga nabo obwitsa mubwifisi, nasi amanyile muno kamukhola mubwifisi nende mubwang’ang’u, ne ukhola ario mwinywe aba yamala okhukora injila ya habwene
Nibamumanya muno baba Abasuku benyu, ne balaboosiakhwo emikhono chiabu nende tsinimi tsiabu khububii, ne bekombanga mbu mube abakhayi
Abeekho benyu nohomba Abana benyu shibalibakhoonya shiosi shiosi tawe, inyanga yeyindukho alibakabukhasia hakari wenyu ninabo ne Nyasaye alolanga muno kamukholanga

Toto enywe mulinende eshilolelo eshilayi khu Ibrahim nende balia abali ninaye, Olwa baboolela Abandu babu mbu, efwe khuli ehale ninanyu nende biamulaamanga bilali Nyasaye, Khubakhayile ne obusuku nende ishinda buloleshe hakari wefu ninanyu okhuula shinga mulisuubila khu Nyasaye mulala, halali amakhuwa ka Ibrahim yaboolela samwana mbu: “Nditsa ukhusabila eshileshelo, ne shendi nobunyali bwosi bwosi khu Nyasaye tawe, Nyasaye wefu Omulesi, newe butswa wakhwisichile, ne ni iwuwo butswa akhuliinjile, ne ni ewuwo butswa akhulikalukha
Nyasaye wefu omulesi, olakhukholela amatemo okhurula khubakhayi, ne okhuleshele ebionoono bwefu, Nyasaye wefu Omulesi toto ewe newe Owamaani Omuchesi muno
Toto bwene abo neshilolelo eshilayi khwinywe, khu ulia wikoombanga okhulolana nende Nyasaye nende inyanga imalilishi, ne ulia ukhaya toto Nyasaye niye Omuyinda Owitsomibuungwa muno
Yakhaba ario Nyasaye yara obuyanzi hakari wenyu nende abasuku benyu, Nyasaye nomunyali mno ne Nyasaye ni Omulesheli Owobukoosia muno

Nyasaye shabakaaninjia tawe balia balabalwaninjia khudini neshibabarusia mutsinzu tsienyu tawe okhubakholela amalayi, nende okhubakholela obuleng’aafu, Toto Nyasaye yayanza balia bakholaanga obuleng’aafu

Netoto abakaninjia okhukhola obwitsa bwa mbusia ngonie nende balia babalwaninjia khudini, mana nibabarusia mutsinzu tsienyu, mana nibakhoonya okhulondwa khwenyu, okhubakhola abalina benyu ba mbusia ngonie, nebabakholanga okhuba abetsa babu ba mbusia ngonie abo nibo abetsimbii

Enywe abasuubila, Abakhasi Abasubili abawuyi nibabeetsela, mubareebe amareebo, Nyasaye niye umanyile muno obusuubili bwabu. Nimunyoola mbu nabasuubili mulabakalusia mubakhayi tawe. Bo shibakwaanila Abasaatsa abo tawe, ne abasatsa abo shibakwanile ninabo tawe ne mukalusilie abasatsa abo shiabarunga, (ikhwe) shinobubii enywe okhubateshia tawe niba mbu mubahelesia omurungo kwabu, Ne mulara Abakhasi abakhayi mukhuteshia khwenyu tawe. Nebareebe shiamwarunga nebareebe shiabarunga, ako niko amalako ka Nyasaye abusia hakari wenyu, Ne Nyasaye ni Omumanyi muno Owamachasi po

Ne Omukhasi yesi yesi khwinywe niyakhakalushila abakhayi, mana nimulwana nende abakhayi, nimunyoola omwandu kweliyie, muhelesie biala babakhasi babu babalekha omwandu kuyelana nende okwabarunga, Ne murie Nyasaye wamusuubilanga

Ewe Omurumwa, Abakhasi abasuubili nibakhwitsila	nibakhulaka	mbu shibalatsokaasia shiosi shiosi nende Nyasaye tawe, neshibaleebatawe,nohombashibalayeya tawe nohomba shibaleera Abana babu tawe, nohomba shibalarera akokhuchikha akarulana hakari wemikhono nende ebilenje biabu, Nohomba shibalakhwikana mumalayi tawe, lakana ninabo, ne obasabile eshileshelo khu Nyasaye , toto Nyasaye Nomulesheli muno Wobukoosia po
Enywe Abasuubila mulakhola obwitsa nende balia ba Nyasaye yasinyishila tawe, bamala okhuwesiakhwo omwoyo amakhuwa komwikulu, shinga aboononi bawesinjiakhwo omwoyo khubandu bomubilindwa
Bitsoominjia Nyasaye biosi bili mwikulu nende mushialo, naye niye Omwami, Owamachesi muno
Enywe Abasuubili, shichila shina ni muboolanga akamulakhola tawe
Ni eshisinyo eshikhongo imbeli wa Nyasaye okhuboola kamulakhola
Toto bwene Nyasaye yayanza balia abalwananga khu injila yiyie khulunyaali shinga lisisi liatilana

Ne Olwa Musa yaboolela Abandu bebe mbu: “Enywe Abandu banje shichila shina musinyisinjia, ne toto mwamanya mbu esie endi Omurumwa wa Nyasaye khwinywe?” ne olwabatsililila nobubii bwabu, Nyasaye yalekha emioyo chikore, ne Nyasaye shalunjisinjia Abandu abakori tawe

Yitsulila Olwa Yesu Omwana wa Mariam yaboola mbu : “Enywe Abana ba Israel esie endi Omurumwa wa Nyasaye khwinywe, efuchilila obwatoto bwendi nabo okhurula mutaurati, nende okhubalachilisia Omurumwa unondakhwo ulangwa mbu Ahmed, olwa yabeetsela baboola mbu buno nobulosi bulolekha
Ne wina wetsimbi muno, okhushilakhwo ulia uchishila Nyasaye abubeyi, naye alangungwa mubusalamu ne Nyasaye shalunjisinjia Abandu ababii tawe
Benyanga okhusumia obulafu bwa Nyasaye ne minwa chiabu, ne Nyasaye alatinyia abulafu bubwe kata abakhayi nibafimba
Niye owaruma Omurumwa wuwe nende obulunjifu nende idini ya toto ilolekhane habulafu okhushila tsi dini thindi, kata Abatsokaasi nibafimba
Enywe Abasuubili, abamanyiekhwo inganga yitsa okhubahonia nende eshinyasio eshilulu
Musubilenje Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, ne mukhalabanenje khunjila ya Nyasaye khu miandu chienyu nende emioyo chienyu ako ni amalayi khwinywe nikaba mbu mwakhamanya
Alabaleshela ebionoono bienyu, ne alabenjisia mwikulu mumikunda chiburanga hasi wachio emialo nende eshimenyo eshilayi mumukunda kwa Eden, okho nikhwo okhubura okhukhongo
Ne eshindi shibachamisia, obukhoonyi okhurula khu Nyasaye nende obushili buli hambi, ne suubisia Abasuubili

Enywe Abasubili mube abahabini ba Nyasaye, Shinga Yesu yareeba abechi bebe, mbu niwina umuhabini wanje khu Nyasaye ? abechi be nibaboola mbu Efwe khuli abahabini ba Nyasaye” Mana nikusuubila omukanda okhurula mubana ba Israil, ne okundi nikukhaya, kho nikhukhoonya kulia okwasuubila khubasuku bakwo, nikushila
Bitsoominjia Nyasaye, ebili mwikulu nende mushialo, Omwami, Woluyali, Owamaani, Owamachesi muno
Ye niye waruma Omurumwa mubandu bakorwa okhusooma, abasoomele amakhuwa ke, ne abatswenule ne abechesie ishitabu nende amachesi, kata nibali inyuma awo mubukori bulolekha
Ne abandi bashili okhuliimaana ninabo, naye niye Owamani Omuchesi po
Etsonitsimbabaasitsia Nyasaye, ahelesinjia owa yenya, Ne Nyasaye niwetsimbabaasi tsinyinji

Abahebwa eshitabu shia Itaurati mana nibalashiloonda tawe, bali shinga isishili ichinjile ebitabu, ni Abandu ababii balibarie, balia abakhaya amakhuwa ka Nyasaye , Ne Nyasaye shalunjisinjia Abandu ababii tawe
Bola, “enywe Abayahudi, nimuparanga mbu enywe muli abeheelwa ba Nyasaye okhushila Abandu boosi, mwikoombe liifwa nikali mbu muboolanga obwatoto
Ne shibanyala okhwikomba liifwa tawe khulwa akabaranjilisia okhukhola, Ne Nyasaye yamanya muno ababii
Bola toto lifwa liamwilukhanga, lilibanyoola, mana mulikalusibwa khumumanyi wa kefisa, nende kalolokhanga, ne alibaboolela koosi kamwakholanga
Enywe Abasuubili, nikulangwa omulaango kwa malaamo inyanga ya chirano, mwilushile okhwitsulila Nyasaye, ne muleshe obukhala , endio nobulayi khwinywe nikali mbu mumanyile
Ne amalaamo nikakhawa, musaalaane khushialo ne mukoonye emikabo chia Nyasaye ni mwitsulile Nyasaye muno, mwakhaba murio mwanyoola okhubura

Ne nibalola obukhala nohomba amakhuwa kabu , bakelushila, ne bakhulekha niwemele, boola mbu: “akali ewa Nyasaye ni amalayi muno okhushila amakhuwa kabu nende inganga, ne Nyasaye niye Omukabi Omulayi umalayo.”
Abeshikhabili nibakhwitsila nibaboola mbu: “Toto efwe khusuubila mbu ewe oli Omurumwa wa Nyasaye” Ne Nyasaye amanyile mbu toto abeshikhabili nababeyi.”
Bakhola ebitsubo biabu okhuba ingabo,	mana nibekalila injila ya Nyasaye, ni amabii muno akabakholonga
Ako nillwokhuba mbu basuubila mana khandi nibakhaya, mana Nyasaye nakhupa eshimanyisio khu mioyo chiabu, mana bo shibamanyile tawe

Ne nobalola, emibili chiabu chikhuchamisia, ne nibaboola orechelesia amakhuwa kabu, opara mbu ni emisala chiyeshibwe, baparanga mbu buli oluyoka lwosi lwosi lupwa lulikhubo. Abo nibo Abasuku ba meso ninabo, Nyasaye yabatsuba, bakoranga barie abwatoto
Ne nibaboolelwa mbu itse Omurumwa abasabile eshileshelo, bayuyia emirwe chiabu, ne obalola nibashukhana nibafurire
Ninashilala khubo, nobasabila eshileshelo nohomba nolekha, Nyasaye shiyakhabaleshela tawe, toto Nyasaye shalunjisinjia abonooni tawe
Nibo baboolonga mbu mulakhoonya balia abali halala nomurumwa tawe, ukhula bamwilushe, ne Nyasaye ni Mwene emikabo chio mwikulu nende mushialo, halali abeshikhabili shibamanyile tawe
Baboolanga mbu nikhukalukha Madina abamaani balaloonda abateshele, Ne amani ni ka Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe nende Abasuubili, halali Abeshikhabili shibamanyile tawe
Enywe Abasuubili, omwandu nende Abana benyu bilachila mwebilila okhumurumbula Nyasaye tawe, ne yesi yesi ukhola ario, aba ali mubatiba

Ne murusie eshihanwa mumiandu chia khwabahelesia, lifwa nilishili okhulila mulala wenyu, mana aboole mbu : “Abaanyiee Nyasaye wanje umetakhwo tsinyanga atiti ndakharusiye eshihanwa, mana ndaba mubandu abalayi
Ne Nyasaye shanyala okhumeta Omundu ebise lifwa lilie niliakhoola tawe, ne Nyasaye nomumanyi muno khukamukholanga
Bitsoominjia Nyasaye biosi bili mwikulu nende mushialo, obwami nobuubwe nende oluyali, naye ni Omunyali wa buli eshindu
Ye niye Owabaloonga ne mwinywe balimwo Abakhayi nende Abasuubili, ne Nyasaye alolanga muno kamukholanga
Yalonga likuli nende eshialo khubwatoto mana nabahelesia obukoondo, obulayi, ne ewuwe niwo wamulikalukha
Yamanya ebili mwikulu nende mushialo ne yamanya kamukholanga mubwifisi nende mubwang’angu, Ne Nyasaye nomumanyi muno khukali mumioyo
Shimwawulilakhwo amacheni kabakhayi abaali imbeli wenyu, bapila omurungo kwa mabii kabu, mana nibaba nende eshinyasio eshilulu

Endio nilwokhubeela mbu babetselanga Abarumwa babu nende obwatoto mana nibamiena mbu: “Omundusa akhuruke !” mana nibakhaya nibafura, Mana Nyasaye nalabateba tawe, ne Nyasaye nomuyinda witsomibungwa muno
Abakhayi bapara mbu shibalilamusibwa tawe. Boola mbu : “ toto, nditsuba khu Nyasaye mbu mulilamusibwa mana muliboolelwa kamwakhola, ne ako khu Nyasaye ni amangu
Kho suubile khu Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, nende obulafu bwa khweshia, ne Nyasaye nomumanyi po khukamukholanga

Inyanga lwa alibakhung’asia khu inyanga yomukhung’aano, eyo niyo inyanga yokhukhobana ne ulia usuubila khu Nyasaye mana akhole amalayi, alaleshelwa tsimbi tsitsie, ne alimwinjisia mwikulu mumikunda chiburangamwo emialo, balimenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi, okho nikho okhubura okhukhongo
Ne balia bakhaya nibayingana khubimanyisio biefu, obo nibo Abandu bomumulilo, balimenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi, ne ni amakalushilo amabii muno
Ne amasila kosikosi shiketsanga tawe halali khubunyali bwa Nyasaye, ne usuubila khu Nyasaye alunjisia omwoyo kukwe, ne Nyasaye ni amumanyi muno wabuli eshindu
Ne muloonde amakhuwa ka Nyasaye nende Omurumwa , ne nimuloba Omurumwa wefu ni okhusia butswa oburume bubwe habulafu
Naye ni Nyasaye abulaho owundi owulali ye tawe, ne Abasuubili basiche butswa Nyasaye

Enywe Abasuubila, toto Mubakhasi benyu nende Abana benyu balimwo abasuku benyu, kho mube meso ninabo, ne nimubeela nemwakhaya okhura mumakani, ne mwaleshela toto bwene Nyasaye ni Omulesheli Owobukoosia muno
Toto emiandu chienyu nabaana benyu namatemo, ne Nyasaye ali nende omurungo omukhongo
Ne murie Nyasaye shinga munyalilwa, ne muwulile, mana muloonde ne murusie eshihanwa, nobulayi khumioyo chienyu ne ulia ulekha obwimani bwo mwoyo kukwe, abo nibo babura
Nimwiwosia Nyasaye likofi lilayi, alabametelakhwo ne alabaleshela ebionono, ne Nyasaye ni Omunji wokhupa orio Omwihotselefu
Yamanya akefisile nende akali habulafu, Owamaani Owamachesi muno

Ewe Omurumwa, nimulekha Abakhasi mubaleshe nebekhale eda yabu, ne mubale tsinnyanga tsia eda, ne murie Nyasaye Omulesi wenyu , Mulabarusia mutsinzu tsiabu tawe, nohomba balarulamwo tawe, halali nibakhola eshifwabi shilolekha, ne etso ni tsinzako tsia Nyasaye ne uruuma tsinzako tsia Nyasaye abatoto yebiyiliye, shomanyile tawe, awundi Nyasaye anyala okhurera likhuwa lindi imbeli wa kano

Ne nibakhamala eda yabu, mubakalushile mumenye ninabo khubulayi, nohomba mubaleshe nomulembe, ne mulaanje abaloli abesikwa mwinywe, ne mukhole obuloli khulwa Nyasaye, endio nilwa mulachilwa khu balia basuubila Nyasaye nende inyanga imalilishi, ne uria Nyasaye, alamukholela obwangu bwokhurula mumatinyu
Ne alamuhelesia omukabo kukwe munjila ya alamanyile tawe, ne wisika Nyasaye , Nyasaye alamuyela, toto Nyasaye yosinjia amalako keke, yamala okhura khubuli eshindu eshichelo

Nebalia bema okhuswamila mubakhasi benyu, nimukanakana awo eda yabu ilaba imiesi chitaru, Nende balia abalaswamilakhwo tawe, ne balia abali inda eda yabu iwa mukhwibula khwabu. Ne uria Nyasaye, amwanguyisilinjia amakhuwa keke
Ako niko amalako ka Nyasaye yamwishilia, ne ulia uria Nyasaye alaleshelwa ebionono bibie ne alamuhelesia omurungo omukhongo

Mubamenyie	mutsinzu tsiamumenyangamwo, ne mulabasandia baba neshibeela tawe, ne nibali hasiro (tsinda) mubahelesie obukhoonyi okhula shingala beboolola (bebula), nenibanunilia Abana benyu mubarunge ne musanjilane khubulayi, ne nimulola obusiro Omukhasi wundi abanunilie

Wobunyali arusie okhulondokhana nobunyali bubwe, ne ulanyalilwa arusie khu shia Nyasaye amuheele, Nyasaye shanichilisinjia Omundu tawe halali khushia omuheelesiye. Nyasaye alarera imbeli wobusiro obwangu
Ne tsingongo tsinga tsiafunaka amalako ka Nyasaye nende Abarumwa bebe, mana nikhubabalila kabakholanga, ne nikhubahelesia eshinyasio eshilulu
Mana nitsipila obubii bwamakhuwa katsio, ne indukho yamakhuwa katsio niba okhusikha
Nyasaye yabarecheshela eshinyasio eshilulu, Kho murie Nyasaye enywe Abamachesi, Abasuubili, toto Nyasaye yabeshilia ametsulisio

Omurumwa ubasoomelanga tsinyaali tsia Nyasaye tsinoosinjia tsirusia balia abasuubila mana nibakhola amalayi mushilima nitsibara mubulafu, ne usuubila khu Nyasaye mana nakhola amalayi alamwinjisia mwikulu mumikunda chiburangamwo emialo, balimenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi, toto Nyasaye alaba amuhelesiyie omukabo omulayi muno

Nyasaye niye ulia owaloonga amakulu saba, nende liloba khu shichelo esho, amalako ke kekhanga hakari watsio, kho mumanye mbu toto Nyasaye ni Omunyali wabuli eshindu, ne toto Nyasaye yamanya buli eshindu shingala shili
Ewe Omurumwa! Mbushina nokaana eshia Nyasaye wuwo yakhufuchilila? Okhaaba	okhuchamisia Abakhaye bobo. Ne Nyasaye ni Omulesheli muno Omukoosia po
Toto Nyasaye yabahelesia injila yokhurimbulula ebitsubo bienyu, ne Nyasaye ni Omwami wenyu, Naye ni Omumanyi muno Owamachesi po

Ne olwa Omurumwa yaboolela mulala khubakhaye be likhuwa liobwifisi, mana omukhaye oyo shingala yalirusia habulafu, ne Nyasaye namanyia Omurumwa, yamwechesia ebuleka ne nakhaya okhumwechesia elubeka wundi. Olwa yamuboolela ario, omukhaye oyo naboola mbu: “wina ukhuboolele kano?” Omurumwa naboola mbu: “Omumanyi wamakhuwa koosi niye umboolele.”

Nimulasaba eshileshelo enywe babili emioyo chienyu chilenjila mubwonooni, ne nimukhonyana khulwo okhukholela Omurumwa amabii, Mumanye mbu toto Nyasaye niye omuhabini wuwe nende Jibril nende abasuubili abakholi bamalayi, ne okhumetakhwo ako Abamalaika balamukhoonya

Nabalekha, Nyasaye anyala okhumuhelesia Abakhaye bandi habundu wenyu, Abalayi okhushila enywe, Abehotselefu, Abasuubili, Abarechelefu, Abekanili , Abalaami, Abakholi bamalayi, nashikoko nende abakhaana bashili okhutekhakhwo

Enywe Abasuubila, honokosie emioyo chenyu nende chia Abandu benyu okhurulana nomulilo kwetsikhwi tsiakwo ni Abandu nende amachina, abalindi bakwo ni Abamalaika abalulu aba amaani, shibakhayanga okhukhola lia Nyasaye ababoolele tawe ne bakholanga liabalomesibwe
Enywe Abakhayi mulayinia ebichila olwa lelo tawe, toto murungungwa kamwakholanga

Enywe Abasuubila, sabe eshileshelo khu Nyasaye eshileshelo shifuchililwa, Nyasaye wenyu alabaleshela tsimbi tsienyu ne alabenjisia mwikulu, mumikunda chiburangamwo emialio, inyanga ya Nyasaye alalifimbia omurwe Omurumwa wuwe nende Abasuubili bali halala naye, obulafu bwabu buliba imbeli, nende elubeka wo mukhono musatsa, baliboola mbu “Nyasaye wefu omulesi khwitsusilie obulafu bwefu, ne okhuleshele ebionono biefu, toto ewe oli Omunyali wabuli eshindu
Ewe Omurumwa, khupatsakana nende abakhayi nende abeshikhabili, ne obe omumilano khubo, ne eshimenyo shiabu ni mumulilo, ne ni amakalushilo amabii muno

Nyasaye yachelasia Abandu abakhayi nende Omukhasiwa Nuhunende Omukhasi wa Lut, bali mumikhono chiabasumba befu balili , abakholi bamalayi, nibabakhoba ne okhukhoba okho nikhulabakhoonya tawe nibaboolelwa mbu: “ injile mumulilo halala nende abenjila.”
